Reviews.Author: Francisco
Reviews.Content: It was a really good computer thanks it really did help me and hope you keep selling these kind of computers

Reviews.Title: Not bad for a refurbished product...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had some problems in the beginning with Internet explorer and Netflix that I couldn't resolve myself and I almost returned it! . After calling Microsoft Support and two days later the agent was able to fix it. Now I am able to stream my movies (which is why I wanted windows 7) and take my surveys and go through my emails without a problem. It's a good little laptop for the money I paid and I have always liked Samsung products. It is light weight and portable with wireless capabilities if I need to take it on the road with me. I love how thin & sleek it is and the built in DVD player for when I watch some movies, but mostly I stream them. It is a refurbished laptop so I got a pretty good price for it too! After Christmas and my wedding last year I couldn't afford a NEW laptop but this one works for me.

ProductInfo.Features:
EXCLUSIVE FAST START TECHNOLOGY:  Don't be weighed down by wasted time, let your PC come alive when you need it. Your life happens on the go, you don't have time to wait for PC to shut down and power up. With Samsung's exclusive Fast Start technology, simply close the lid to enter a hybrid sleep mode. When you open the lid, you are up and running in less than 3 sec.
STUNNING SLIM BEZEL DISPLAY:  The screen on your PC is its gateway to wonder. With Samsungs slim bezel technology, you get more in a smaller footprint. By minimizing the bezel and maximizing the screen you have a highly portable PC without sacrificing screen size. From email to presentations, photos to videos, and everything in between, make your content come alive. More screen gives you more to love.
POWERPLUS BATTERY TECHNOLOGY:  A battery designed for the long haul, the Samsung Powerplus technology gives you more years and more hours. This technology retains 80% of the original battery capacity for up to 1,000 charges. After 3 years of use you still have a battery that still works for you day in and day out. That's power when you need it.
STYLISH SAMSUNG DESIGN:  A stunning, subdued design that balances the work and play role of every notebook. The Samsung Series 3 15.6" features a brushed metal look exterior with brushed chrome trim. Look stylish wherever you use it.
BUILT FOR SPEED:  Brilliant HD entertainment beckons. With quad-core speed and discrete-class graphics, VISION A6 Technology with the AMD Quad-Core A6 Series Accelerated Processor lets you experience the next dimension of entertainment. Shoot, edit and share your own HD movies effortlessly. Watch Blu-ray 3D movies. Video chat, surf the Web and listen to music at the same time. Or flee into the insanely lifelike arena of HD 3D games.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Np305v5a-a0cus Amd 4x A6-3410mx 1.6ghz 4gb 500gb Dvd+/-rw 15.6 Win 7 [black]
